official_title: A bill to improve the management of the Chaco Culture National Historical Park and its related archeological protection sites.

summary.text: Adds specified Navajo archaeological protection sites to the Chaco Culture National Historical Park, New Mexico. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to select and report to the Congress on one such site as a detached, interpretive unit. Increases the authorization of appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to improve the management of the Chaco Culture National Historical Park and its related archeological protection sites.
